contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Australian place | type = town | name = Dixons Creek | state = vic | image = DixonsCreekPrimarySchool.JPG | caption = Primary school | lga = Shire of Yarra Ranges | postcode = 3775 | pop = 596 (2006)<ref name="abs">{{Census 2006 AUS | id = SSC25489 | name = Dixons Creek (State Suburb) | accessdate = 2009-02-07 | quick = on}}</ref> | est = | elevation= 160 | coordinates ={{coord|37|36|S|145|25|E|display=inline,title|region:AU_type:city_source:GNS-enwiki}} | alternative_location_map = Australia Victoria metropolitan Melbourne | latd =37 |latm =36 |lats = | longd =145 |longm =25 |longs = | pushpin_label_position = left | stategov = [[Electoral district of Seymour|Seymour]] | fedgov = [[Division of McEwen|McEwen]] | dist1 = 46 | location1= [[Melbourne]] | dist2 = 14 | location2= [[Healesville, Victoria|Healesville]] | near-nw = [[Toolangi, Victoria|Toolangi]] | near-n = [[Toolangi, Victoria|Toolangi]] | near-ne = [[Toolangi, Victoria|Toolangi]] | near-w = [[St Andrews, Victoria|St Andrews]] | near-e = [[Chum Creek, Victoria|Chum Creek]] | near-sw = [[Yarra Glen, Victoria|Yarra Glen]] | near-s = [[Coldstream, Victoria|Coldstream]] | near-se = [[Healesville, Victoria|Healesville]] }} '''Dixons Creek''' is a town in [[Victoria (Australia)|Victoria]], [[Australia]], 46 km north-east of Melbourne's [[Melbourne city centre|central business district]]. Its [[Local government areas of Victoria|local government area]] is the [[Shire of Yarra Ranges]]. At the [[Census in Australia#2006|2006 Census]], Dixons Creek had a population of 596. The Post Office opened around 1902 and closed in 1967.<ref name = "a">{{Citation| last = Premier Postal History | title = Post Office List | url = https://www.premierpostal.com/cgi-bin/wsProd.sh/Viewpocdwrapper.p?SortBy=VIC&country= | accessdate = 2008-04-11 }}</ref> Dixons Creek has a [http://www.eduweb.vic.gov.au/schoolsonline/Details.asp?LocationID=01158501 primary school], with currently 34 students. It is part of the Wollombi Cluster (11 small schools in the area). ==References== {{commons category}} {{reflist}} {{Shire of Yarra Ranges suburbs}} [[Category:Towns in Victoria (Australia)]] [[Category:Yarra Valley]] {{VictoriaAU-geo-stub}}
